part-4_key2: Now, every time after asking the question, you need to take `input` from the user, so that he can guess what will be the correct answer.
part-4_key3:
Users can answer either 1, 2, 3, or 4.
Now, you have taken the answer as an `input` from the user, now you need to check if the user has given the correct answer or not.
part-4_key4: If the answer is correct then print `"Congrats! Aapka answer sahi hai"` otherwise `Sadly aapka javab ga1lat hai.`
